name: 5 Minutes Until Halloween
description:
Halloween is in a few minutes. This year, you didn't bother making a costume.

But the king of Halloween  is not okay with that.

"Five minutes. You will have to repeat the same five minutes, over and over, for all eternity, if you don't bring me a decent costume.

The clock is ticking."

Explore your surroundings and try to find the scariest outfits to satisfy the Halloween King! Otherwise, you might be here a while...

Controls : Use the mouse and click wherever you want to go.

A lot of features were scrapped due to time contraints (and me being an idiot :D ) but I had a blast working on this, I already started to plan an update with more characters, locations, bug fixes, etc.

Submission for Ludum Dare 47.

Head of project: Sebastien "Glaas" Decuyper

2D artist:  Yasmine "MidnightBrightSide" Skinner

Sound, music: Danae Le Guennic

Additional programming: Siddharta "Sidremus" Mitterberger
